title: AT-05 JSONL output formatting
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-05 with a JSONL formatting test.

Plan: Add a unit or integration test that captures stdout for OutputFormat::Jsonl and validates required fields.

title: Add GPU auto-select validation and logging
description: Add runtime log output and/or acceptance guidance to confirm GPU backend selection on NVIDIA/AMD and CPU fallback when unavailable.

title: Add chunking and VAD segmentation
description: Implement chunking (200-500 ms) and a simple energy-based VAD that detects speech start/end to segment utterances. Success: silence is skipped and utterances are finalized after a configurable silence timeout.

title: AT-02 missing model returns exit code 2
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-02 with an automated check for missing model errors.

Plan: Add an integration test that runs the CLI with a config pointing to a missing model file and asserts exit code 2 plus error message.

title: Stream transcription output
description: Superseded by push-to-talk flow; streaming partials removed from scope.

title: Add whisper.cpp FFI bindings
description: Integrate whisper.cpp as a vendored dependency or submodule and create minimal Rust FFI bindings to load a ggml model and run inference on a PCM buffer. Include build script to compile whisper.cpp. Success: a small integration test can load the model file and return a non-empty transcript for a short sample buffer.

title: Add daemon mode with socket listener
description: Introduce a daemon mode that listens on a Unix socket for toggle commands. On toggle on, start capture; on toggle off, transcribe and route output to stdout or injection based on config. Provide lifecycle guidance (systemd user unit or foreground flag) and ensure graceful shutdown.

title: AT-06 offline operation
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-06 with a deterministic offline test.

Plan: Add an env-gated integration test (SV_TEST_OFFLINE=1) that runs the CLI in a network-isolated context (e.g., unshare netns when available) and ensures transcription still succeeds; skip if isolation is unsupported.

title: Implement push-to-talk hotkey capture
description: Implement a push-to-talk hotkey listener (default ctrl+`) to start/stop audio capture.

title: AT-04 daemon toggle captures and transcribes
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-04 with an automated daemon toggle flow.

Plan: Use the integration harness with a fake audio source and fake transcriber to start the daemon, send toggle on/off, and assert final transcript output.

title: AT-07 GPU auto-select and CPU fallback
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-07 with automated GPU and CPU fallback checks.

Plan: Add env-gated integration tests that verify GPU backend selection logs when SV_TEST_GPU=1 and successful CPU fallback output when GPU is unavailable or SV_TEST_GPU=0.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: SV_TEST_GPU=1 cargo test --test acceptance (AT-07); cargo test --test acceptance (CPU fallback).

title: AT-03 invalid input device returns exit code 3
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-03 with a deterministic test for invalid input devices.

Plan: Add a test that injects a fake audio host or uses a test-only audio selector to return a missing device error and asserts exit code 3.

title: Add daemon socket toggle control
description: Implement socket-based control commands for the daemon. Use the same binary: sv --daemon starts the service, sv sends toggle requests over the Unix socket. Provide actionable errors when the daemon is not running or the socket is unavailable.

title: Initialize Rust CLI skeleton for sv
description: Create a new Rust binary crate named sv with clap-based argument parsing for model path, language, device, sample-rate, format, and vad. Add a config struct and a main entrypoint that validates the model path and prints a startup banner. Success:  starts and validates args;  shows documented flags.

title: Auto-download configured model
description: Goals: Download the configured ggml model automatically on startup when missing, using language and size config (auto maps to general model) and allowing a custom install path.\n\nPlan: Add config fields for model language/size and optional model_path, resolve a default data directory, implement a downloader that checks on startup, and wire model selection into whisper load. Update errors to report download failures with actionable guidance.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: Run cargo test; run manual acceptance tests AT-01a, AT-02, AT-04 with a missing model.

title: Implement audio capture pipeline
description: Use cpal to capture mono audio from the selected input device at 16 kHz and feed samples into a ring buffer. Add device listing/selection support. Success: running sv logs incoming audio levels without crashing and respects the --device flag.

title: Transcribe on key release only
description: Run transcription only after key release, using the captured buffer. Emit a single final transcript in plain/jsonl formats.

title: Load config.toml from XDG path
description: Load config from /home/kejne/.config/soundvibes/config.toml. Parse TOML with defaults when keys missing.

title: Document local validation steps
description: Add a validation section to the README that references the MVP acceptance tests and how to run them manually. Success: README contains step-by-step validation instructions tied to docs/mvp/acceptance-tests.md.

title: Add acceptance test harness for Soundvibes CLI
description:
Goals: Provide a reusable integration test harness with injectable audio sources/transcribers and stdout capture for daemon flows.

Plan: Add test-only adapters for audio input and transcription; expose helpers to run daemon loops in tests; document env gates for hardware-dependent tests.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: cargo test (targeted new harness tests).

title: Enable GPU backends (Vulkan/CUDA) in build
description: Enable whisper.cpp build flags for Vulkan (AMD/NVIDIA) and CUDA (NVIDIA) so GPU backends are available when supported. Ensure CPU build still works when GPU SDKs are missing.

title: Auto-select GPU backend with CPU fallback
description: Use whisper.cpp runtime params to enable GPU usage by default, detect supported NVIDIA/AMD devices, and fall back to CPU with clear logs. No user GPU selection required.

title: Add error handling and exit codes
description: Implement consistent error handling for missing model and invalid device from config.toml. Map exit codes to PRD: 2 for invalid config/missing model, 3 for audio device errors. Success: acceptance tests AT-02 and AT-03 pass with correct exit codes and messages.

title: AT-01 daemon starts with valid model
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-01 with an automated test that verifies the daemon starts with a valid model path.

Plan: Add an integration test that runs the binary with a temp config pointing to a real model (SV_MODEL_PATH), starts the daemon, and shuts it down cleanly.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: cargo test --test acceptance (AT-01). Use SV_MODEL_PATH when required.

title: Implement text injection backends
description: Add a text output abstraction with backends for Wayland (portal virtual keyboard/input capture) and X11 (XTest). Inject transcribed text at the focused cursor when mode=inject, with fallback to stdout and clear errors when unavailable.
